Contains DailyMed database of USPI labels Over 30,000 current USPIs, updated daily Includes Medication Guides and FDA Letters NDC indexed for ancillary drug information Contains eMC database of SPC labels Over 6,000 current SPCs, updated daily Includes Patient Information Leaflets (PILs)
